Module app
Package appv2.core

Class View

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
appv2.core.View
public class View extends javafx.application.Application

Implements high-level methods relevant for the Graphical User Interface.

      private static MasterController masterController

      MasterController object.
      Is valid throughout the entirety of the application runtime and not destroyed until the application is killed.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws IOException

      Called by the JavaFX Application Thread to initialize the Graphical User Interface.
      This method initializes the MasterController and loads the MainMenu FXML file.

      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      stage - Stage object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the MainMenu FXML file cannot be loaded.
      See Also:
      • MasterController

    • run

      public static void run()

      Entry point for the Graphical User Interface.
      Call this method to launch the GUI.

      See Also:
      • GameInstance.run()

    • loadFXML

      public static <T> T loadFXML(String path)

      Loads an FXML file from the resources folder.

      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of the FXML file to load.
      Parameters:
      path - Path to the FXML file to load.
      Returns:
      The loaded FXML file.

    • renderExistingScreen

      public static void renderExistingScreen(String identifier)

      Renders an existing screen.

      Parameters:
      identifier - Identifier of the screen to render.

    • renderExistingScreenOfType

      public static void renderExistingScreenOfType(String prefix) throws RuntimeException

      Renders an existing screen of a specific type.
      This method is useful if you have multiple screens of the same type and want to render one of them.

      Parameters:
      prefix - Prefix of the screen to render.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If no screen with the specified prefix exists.
      See Also:
      • MasterController.GAME
      • MasterController.getUniqueIdentifier(String)

    • renderNewScreen

      public static String renderNewScreen(GameScene gameScene, boolean bKeepOldAlive)

      Renders a new screen.

      Parameters:
      gameScene - GameScene object to render.
      bKeepOldAlive - Whether to keep the old screen alive or not.
      Returns:
      Unique identifier of the old screen (only relevant if the old screen should be killed after use).
      See Also:
      • MasterController.activate(String, boolean)

    • killScreen

      public static void killScreen(String identifier)

      Removes a screen from the rendered list.

      Parameters:
      identifier - Unique identifier of the scree to remove.
      See Also:
      • MasterController.removeScreen(String)

    • getActiveGameScene

      public static GameScene getActiveGameScene() throws RuntimeException

      Getter for the currently active screen.

      Returns:
      The GameScene object of the currently active screen.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If no active screen is found.
